keyEvents.title: Luffy Crashes into Duval's Hideout
keyEvents.description: Luffy crashes into Duval's fortified hideout structure while grabbing onto a flying fish, forcing a direct confrontation.
keyEvents.significance: The crash leads to the face-to-face meeting that results in Duval's mask being removed and his identity revealed.

keyEvents.title: Duval's Mask Removed
keyEvents.description: Inside the hideout, Duval has his iron mask kicked off by Luffy, revealing his face.
keyEvents.significance: The location serves as the setting for the episode's major reveal.

description: A fortified structure used as the base of operations for Duval and the Flying Fish Riders, located in the waters near Sabaody Archipelago.
historicalSignificance: The location where Duval's identity was revealed to the Straw Hat Pirates.
